alert.note: Alert for Adair; Adams; Madison; Union (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 19 at 5:14PM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT SOUTHWESTERN MADISON...UNION... NORTHEASTERN ADAMS AND ADAIR COUNTIES THROUGH 545 PM CDT... At 513 PM CDT, a personal weather station indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 10 miles southwest of Stuart to 6 miles southeast of Greenfield to 6 miles west of Creston. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail and additional heavy rainfall of one to two inches. SOURCE...Personal Weather Station. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Ponding of water on roadways, low visibilities, and rises in small streams and creeks. Locations impacted include... Creston, Greenfield, Green Valley Lake, Afton, Casey, Orient, Macksburg, Cromwell, Arispe, Creston Municipal Airport, Greenfield Municipal Airport, Nodaway Park, and Green Valley Lake State Park. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 78 and 88. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
